name: EthereumStatusBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is indented to provide a short flash briefing, highlighting an updated message regarding current trending Ethereum news.

The news consist of latest crypto news, ranging from new Altcoin deliveries, crypto currency prices, new ICO's announcements and much more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
